poissontemplate 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

poissontemplate

poissontemplate provides a custom pkgdown template for Poisson consulting packages. Please don’t use it for your own package.

Setup

For all sites, ensure that DESCRIPTION contains:

Config/Needs/website: maelle/poissontemplate

by editing the file manually or by running desc::desc_set("Config/Needs/website", "maelle/poissontemplate").

Installation

You can install the development version of poissontemplate from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("maelle/poissontemplate")
